title: " Are my blood products coming?": Implementation of a novel blood product tracker in the electronic health record system
details: T Chai, C Hartzell, R Winstead, K Krokosky, K Atchison… - Transfusion
abstract: Background Blood transfusions are the most common procedure performed in American hospitals. The steps required for blood product delivery are often misunderstood by providers, leading to numerous phone calls to the blood bank …
